sentences.sentence: So when Skakkebaek and his team saw the news about the choirboys they contacted the Royal Chapel choir.
sentences.translation: 就在斯卡贝克与他的团队看到这则关于唱诗班男孩的新闻后，他们即刻与皇家礼拜堂唱诗班联系。

sentences.sentence: Well, four of them, standing around looking like wax dummies, are indeed wax models of the Beatles as most people remember them: nicely brushed long hair, dark suits, faces like sassy choirboys.
sentences.translation: 对，其中四个看起来像是蜡像，也就是被人广为熟知的披头士蜡像形象：梳理整齐的长发、黑西装、一脸时髦唱诗班男孩像。
